TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PeerCollaboration extends System.Object
public ref class PeerCollaboration abstract sealed

summary.span: 与对等方协作基础结构进行交互。

span.span: Interacts with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.

summary.span: 很多核心协作方案都是从此类着手的。

span.span: Many of the core collaboration scenarios begin with this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类是静态类-它是密封的，并且没有公共构造函数。This class is a static class - it is sealed, abstract and does not have a public constructor. 它用于包含和管理已接受到协作会话邀请的对等方的应用程序、对象和状态信息。It is used to contain and manage application, object, and presence information for peers that have accepted invitations to a collaboration session. 就同级、对象和应用程序而言，PeerCollaboration 类提供三个访问器，一个用于每个集合，作为接口或连接点，适用于计算机上发生的任何其他情况。In terms of peers, objects, and applications, the PeerCollaboration class provides three accessors, one for each collection, as an interface or point of connectivity for whatever else is happening on the machine. 此类不能被继承;如果将此密封类指定为基类，则会发生编译时错误。This class cannot be inherited; a compile-time error will occur if this sealed class is specified as the base class. 此类中的方法和属性可用于：Methods and properties in this class can be used to: - 启动和管理协作应用程序Launch and manage collaborative applications - 注册并删除应用程序和协作对象 (如证书、图片、头像和文本说明) Register and delete applications and collaboration objects (such as certificates, pictures, avatars, and text descriptions) - 邀请对等节点加入协作会话，包括将通过 Internet 识别的项目（如作用域和对象）Invite peers to collaboration sessions, including items such as scope and objects which will identify them over the Internet - 允许对等方 和 协作基础结构进行管理，管理联系人列表，或相互发布联系人Allow peers to and of the collaboration infrastructure, manage lists of contacts, or publish their presence to each other - 利用 属性和事件来协调异步应用程序通信，特别是对名称、状态、应用程序或其他对象的更改。Utilize properties and events to coordinate asynchronous application communication, especially for changes in name, presence, application, or other objects. "链接-本地云"、"调用对等方的子网" 和 "网络邻居作用域" 是同义词术语。"Link-local cloud", "subnet of the calling peer", and "NearMe scope" are synonymous terms. "Internet 范围" 和 "无服务器状态" 是同义词。"Internet scope" and "serverless presence" are synonymous. 站点本地 在协作命名空间中没有等效项。The site-local has no equivalent in the collaboration namespace. 使用此类中的每个方法或属性都需要 的 。The use of every method or property in this class requires a of . 此状态是在对等方协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.

summary.span: 获取 对象，该对象包含应用程序在远程对等方的协作请求下启动时所需的信息。

span.span: Gets the object that contains information needed when an application is started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer.

value.span: 如果应用程序是在邀请下启动的，将返回一个 对象（其中既包含有关发送应用程序邀请的对等方的信息，也包含邀请本身）；否则将返回 。

span.span: If the application was started due to an invitation, a object that contains both information about the peer that sent the application invitation and the invitation itself is returned; otherwise, is returned.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在启动后可由识别协作的 实例使用，以确定它是否因远程对等方的协作请求而开始。This property is to be used by a collaboration-aware instance after it is started to determine whether it was started due to a collaboration request from a remote peer. 调用应用程序应检查 和 属性以获取有关邀请请求的详细信息。The calling application should inspect the and properties to get further information about the invitation request. 对此属性的访问需要 的为 。Access to this property requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对等对象的引用不再有效时，将自动取消注册对等对象 (从对等方协作基础结构中删除) 。Peer objects are automatically unregistered (removed) from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure when a reference to the object is no longer valid. 如果调用方未维护对该对象的引用，则将从对等方协作基础结构中注销该对象。If a caller does not maintain a reference to the object, it is unregistered from the Peer Collaboration infrastructure. 或者，可以使用此方法手动取消注册对象。Alternatively, an object can be manually unregistered by using this method. 调用此方法需要 的 。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，调用对等方需要通过方法登录到对等方协作基础结构 。The calling peer is required to sign in to the peer collaboration infrastructure with the method prior to calling this method. 对此方法的访问需要 的为 。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将应用程序注册到协作基础结构：The following code example illustrates how to register an application with the Collaboration infrastructure: [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法允许远程对等方查询对象已注册到的范围。This method allows the object to be queried by remote peers participating in the scope in which the object was registered. 如果以前已注册过该对象，则此方法将更新其注册。If the object was previously registered, this method updates its registration. 如果已注册的对象超出范围，则可以通过方法进行检索 。If a registered object falls out of scope, it can be retrieved via the method. 数据部分的大小 必须小于或等于16384字节。The size of the data portion of the must be less than or equal to 16,384 bytes. 对此方法的访问需要 的为 。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

summary.span: 让对等方以指定的 登录协作基础结构。

span.span: Signs the peer into the collaboration infrastructure with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示名称不一定是唯一的。Display names are not necessarily unique. 用户应在接受协作邀请之前，通过电子邮件、电话或人员来验证用户的身份。Users should verify the identity of the person using the display name by email, phone, or in person before accepting a collaboration invitation. 此函数将用户登录到协作基础结构。This function signs the users into the Collaboration Infrastructure. 对此方法的访问需要 的为 。Access to this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将用户登录到协作基础结构。The following code example illustrates how to sign the users into the Collaboration infrastructure. [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#1)]

summary.span: 获取调用对等方可在其中发布状态、功能和对象信息的 。

value.span: 一个 对象，指定调用对等方将参与的范围。

span.span: object that specifies the scope in which the calling peer will participate.
The default value for this property is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机或主机应用程序可以使用不同的范围限制或区分对等互连活动。The peer host or host application may limit or differentiate peer participation in collaboration activities by using separate scopes. 调用对等方应检查此方法的返回值，以确定它可以成功执行的其他操作。The calling peer should inspect the return value from this method to determine what further actions it can successfully perform.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void SignOut(valuetype System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope peerScope) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SignOut (peerScope As PeerScope)

param.name: peerScope
param.span: 由 指定的范围枚举。

span.span: Scope enumeration specified by .

summary.span: 从指定范围注销对等方。

span.span: Signs the peer out of the specified scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是特定于应用程序的操作，注销可能会影响当前正在运行的其他应用程序。This method is not an application-specific operation and signing out may affect other applications that may be currently running. 如果用户尚未登录到指定的范围，则调用此方法会导致不会操作。If the user is not already signed into the specified scope calling this method results in a no-op. 当用户注销网络邻居时，会从 终结点对象集删除其已发布信息。When a user signs out of People Near Me, their published information is deleted from the endpoint object set. 这包括 和 ，以及调用对等方注册到协作基础结构中的任何标识对象。This includes and , in addition to any identifying objects registered by the calling peer into the collaboration infrastructure. 由于此信息已删除，因此它不再可用于远程对等机或对等主机进行协作。Because this information is deleted, it is no longer available to either remote peers or a peer host for collaboration. 从类的角度来看 ，与受信任的联系人共享相同的信息是不相关的; 使用 类不会影响保存此信息的其他对象（如远程对等对象） 。From the perspective of the class, other sharing of the same information with trusted contacts is not relevant; use of the class does not affect other objects in which this information was persisted, such as a remote peer object. 同样，从中删除对等方 不会影响其在协作应用程序中的存在性; 其他联系人仍能够查看其状态，并与之协作。Likewise, deleting a peer from the does not affect its presence in a collaboration application; other contacts are still able to view its presence and collaborate with it. 调用此方法需要 的 。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.

span.span: The parameter contains an invalid enumeration value.
The operation could not be completed.

span.span: The to unregister for the calling peer.

param.name: type
param.span: 要为调用对等或计算机上存在的所有对等执行的注销类型。

span.span: The type of deregistration to perform for either the calling peer or for all peers that exist on the machine.

summary.span: 从 基础结构中注销指定的 。

span.span: Unregisters the specified from the infrastructure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消注册将 停止调用对等方接收它的协作邀请。Unregistering a stops the calling peer from receiving collaboration invitations for it. 如果正在注销的应用程序以前未注册，则这是一个无操作。If the application being unregistered was not previously registered, this is a no-op. 调用此方法需要 的 。Calling this method requires a of . 此状态是在 协作会话开始时创建的。This state is created when the collaboration session begins.
